title: Squinting for things I cannot yet see
description: A collection of poems and prose about the shadows and light of ordinary living. Poems about the pool, school, toothbrushes, strawberries, children's drawings - all laced with hardship and hope. One reader says, "Jean Reinhold is a gifted poet, who employs astonishing clarity, wisdom, integrity, imagination, and language."
author: Jean Reinhold
